articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark DPRK Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark DPRK Founding Anniversary
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday to celebrate the 68th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK).
					 President Kim Il Sung declared all over the world the founding of the DPRK on September 9, Juche 37 (1948) on the basis of the experience of building the people's power gained in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolution and on the basis of the firm foundation laid in the building of the independent and sovereign state after Korea's liberation.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other senior officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, members of the party central leading organ in Pyongyang, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials of organs and industrial establishments in Pyongyang, labor innovators, bereaved family members of revolutionary martyrs, a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and premier of the DPRK Cabinet, made a report.
					
					 He said that the founding of the DPRK meant the birth of the new type people's power, the first of its kind in history, and an event of national historic significance as it brought about a dramatic turn in carving out the destiny of the Korean people and building a rich and powerful country.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Over the nearly seven decades the DPRK has made a history of great victory and changes, most successfully implementing a lot of historic tasks of building a powerful state in the era of independence despite the stern tempest of the revolution under the guidance of the great leaders and great Party.
					
					 The great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed undying exploits by building powerful politico-ideological, military and economic potentials so that the DPRK might achieve prosperity down through generations.
					
					 The great leaders set forth the single-minded unity as foundation of Korean-style socialism and mainstay for building a powerful country and strengthened the driving force of the revolution in every way, consolidating the politico-ideological position of the DPRK as firm as a rock.
					
					 During the whole period of leading the revolution, the great leaders attached utmost importance to military affairs and directed all efforts to bolstering up national defence capability, turning the Korean People's Army into a matchless revolutionary Paektusan army and glorifying the DPRK as a world military power.
					
					 The great leaders regarded the reunification of the country as the greatest patriotic cause and made every possible effort to hand down a reunified country to posterity till the last moments of their revolutionary lives. They made undying contributions to accomplishing the cause of global independence through their energetic external activities.
					
					 The DPRK is greeting the greatest heyday in the building of a powerful socialist country under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the reporter stressed, adding:
					
					 The DPRK will thoroughly implement the three charters for national reunification true to the Juche-oriented line of reunification set forth by the great leaders and thus surely achieve the historic cause of national reunification by the concerted efforts of all Koreans.
					
					 The government of the DPRK will as ever firmly preserve the tenet of its foreign policy--independence, peace and friendship, and make proactive efforts to boost the good-neighborly relations and friendly and cooperative relations with those countries which respect the sovereignty of the DPRK and are friendly towards it, protect peace and security in the region and achieve global independence.
					
					 No force on earth can block the army and people of the DPRK dashing ahead like the wind towards the high eminence of a socialist power, having Kim Jong Un at the helm of the revolution, he concluded.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Slams Obama's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Slams Obama's Reckless Remarks 
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Obama on his visit to Laos to take part in East Asian Summit at a recent joint press conference said the DPRK's continued ballistic rocket launches are "provocative" and that its nuclear and ballistic rocket program poses "threats" to the partners in the region and the U.S., adding that "provocation" would entail increased pressure and he would try to make sanctions against the DPRK more effective.
					 A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK in a statement Thursday said that Obama's reckless remarks are nothing but last-ditch efforts to dodge the criticism of the hostile policy toward the DPRK mounting inside and outside the U.S. and give a further boost to the international atmosphere of pressure on the DPRK.
					
					 The only way of averting a war and defending peace in Korea, the world's biggest hotspot where constant danger of a nuclear war lingers due to the U.S. which is staging joint military exercises for a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK after introducing lots of strategic assets, is to increase in every way the military capabilities for self-defence with the nuclear deterrence as a pivot, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. is talking about dialogue and negotiations while slapping unprecedentedly harsh economic sanctions against the DPRK and kicking up conspiratorial "human rights" racket in league with hostile forces. This is an intolerable mockery and insult to the DPRK.
					
					 The best way for the U.S. to escape deadly blows of the DPRK is to exercise self-prudence and self-restraint, not encroaching upon the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will take multi-phased eventful measures for doubling its capabilities for nuclear attack to cope with the U.S. vicious hostile policy toward the DPRK aimed to dare threaten its sovereignty and right to existence, the statement warned.

articles.title: Joint Resolution Released
articles.content:
Joint Resolution Released
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The north, the south and overseas headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) released a joint resolution on September 8.
					 The resolution said:
					
					 71 years have passed since the U.S. imperialist aggression forces landed in south Korea under the mask of "liberator".
					
					 The U.S. forces' occupation of south Korea was an illegal and gangster-like aggression perpetrated with a sinister aim to lay a bridgehead for carrying out their ambition to dominate Asia and the rest of the world by conquering the whole of Korea.
					
					 It is really deplorable that Korea, which was neither a war criminal state nor a defeated nation, has suffered the tragedy of national division for decades under the colonial rule of the Yankees.
					
					 As long as the U.S. forces are present in south Korea, neither peace can settle on this land nor can reunification, the desire of the nation, be achieved nor the danger of a nuclear war be defused.
					
					 The north, the south and overseas headquarters of the Pomminryon issue the following resolution with the will to drive out the U.S. forces out of south Korea, achieve the independent reunification of the country and take the lead in ushering in a new era of nation's prosperity:
					
					1. Pomminryon will take the lead in the struggle for driving the U.S. forces out of the country as soon as possible and achieve the complete sovereignty and durable peace of the nation.
					
					2. Pomminryon will resolutely smash the reckless war moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad.
					
					3. Pomminryon will vigorously promote the great national unity.
					
					 The resolution ardently called on all Koreans to firmly unite under the banner of By Our Nation Itself and turn out as one in the nation-wide anti-U.S. sacred war for driving the U.S. forces out of the country and ushering in a new era of an independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Top Prize Awarded to DPRK Ministry of Public Health
articles.content:
Top Prize Awarded to DPRK Ministry of Public Health
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A top prize of the public health of the Regional Office for Southeast Asia of the WHO was awarded to the Ministry of Public Health of the DPRK.
					 The prize was conveyed on Sept. 5 to Jang Jun Sang, vice-minister of Public Health, who is heading a DPRK public health delegation at the 69th South-East Asia Regional Assembly of the WHO now underway in Sri Lanka.
					
					 The conferment of the prize upon the Ministry of Public Health of the DPRK is a vivid expression of sympathy and support for the advantages and vitality of the socialist healthcare system whereby modern healthcare centers and cultural and welfare establishments have been built one after another to achieve great successes in the work for promoting people's health and the preventive and curative medical care thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un's policy of prioritizing, respecting and loving the people.

articles.title: AFP President Leaves
articles.content:
AFP President Leaves
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- AFP President Emmanuel Hoog and his party left here Thursday.
					 During their stay in the DPRK, there was a meeting for opening the AFP Pyongyang Bureau under an agreement between the KCNA and AFP.
					
					 Present there were Kim Chang Gwang, director general of the KCNA, and officials concerned, AFP President Emmanuel Hoog and his party.

articles.title: Kanji Inoki Here
articles.content:
Kanji Inoki Here
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councillors of Japan, and his party arrived here Thursday.

articles.title: Emergency Relief Activities in Flood-hit Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
Emergency Relief Activities in Flood-hit Areas of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Red Cross Society launched an emergency relief campaign in the flood-hit areas of North Hamgyong Province.
					 According to an official concerned, its relief workers have conducted their energetic activities to heal flood damage and stabilize the inhabitants of flood-hit areas, in cooperation with members of the delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies.
					
					 The society rapidly offered its provincial branch such relief goods for more than 5 000 families as tents, kitchenware, quilts, water pails and daily necessities.
					
					 Meanwhile, members of the society and volunteers set up first-aid stations in various places to conduct medical service for the flood victims.

articles.title: Kim Ki Nam Meets Heads of Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study rganizations
articles.content:
Kim Ki Nam Meets Heads of Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study rganizations
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with heads of delegations and delegates of the organizations for the study of the Juche idea including Harish Gupta, vice-director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, on Thursday.

articles.title: Int'l Seminar on Juche Idea Held
articles.content:
Int'l Seminar on Juche Idea Held
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- An international seminar on the Juche idea for anti-imperialism, independence and solidarity took place at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK. It was sponsored by the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI).
					 Present there were delegations and delegates of the organizations for the study of the Juche idea from different countries and regions including Harish Gupta, vice-director general of the IIJI.
					
					 On hand were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education, who is also chairman of the Korean Social Scientists Association, and officials concerned.
					
					 Takao Kamakura, director of the IIJI, made an opening address to be followed by a congratulatory speech of Thae Hyong Chol.
					
					 They expressed belief that the seminar would mark a historic meeting for exchanging achievements and experience gained in studying and disseminating the Juche idea and grasping theoretical and practical issues arising in the struggle for independence against imperialism.
					
					 Harish Gupta made a report.
					
					 He said that the seminar is of weighty significance as it was opened at the time when humankind's desire for independence is growing stronger as the days go by.
					
					 He underscored the need for the Juche idea study organizations to conduct more brisk activities for studying and disseminating Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism that has powerfully encouraged the cause of independence among broad masses by dint of unprecedented attraction and steadily expand the ranks of the Juche idea followers.
					
					 Noting that the just cause advancing under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism will win a sure victory, he ardently called for getting firmly united under the uplifted banner of anti-imperialist struggle and making dynamic efforts to build a free and peaceful, new world free from aggression and war.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The speakers explained the issues arising in achieving global independence through solidarity and alliance under the banner of anti-imperialist independence, guided by the immortal Juche idea.
					
					  A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Int'l Seminar
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Int'l Seminar
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a letter by the participants in the international seminar on the Juche idea for anti-imperialism, independence and solidarity on Thursday.
					 The letter said that the current international seminar is of greater significance as it took place on the motherland of Juche during the historic period when all the people of the DPRK are making leaping advances in building a socialist power with the pride and honor of electing the respected HE Kim Jong Un as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea at its 7th Congress.
					
					 We can keenly feel your noble moral sense of obligation and loyalty of carrying forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders and clearly witnessed the steadfast attitude and faith of the DPRK once again, the letter said, and went on:
					
					 The reality of the DPRK instilled confidence in the future and conviction of victory into the followers of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in the world struggling for the cause of human independence. 
					
					 We will make a more widespread and deeper study and dissemination of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as required by the developing reality, cherishing it as firm faith, and thus make a positive contribution to achieving independence in every country and accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 The imperialists and hostile forces are standing in the way of the peoples struggling for independence through wars and violence but their foolish moves are bound to be frustrated and the world people are sure to emerge victorious in their struggle for achieving independence.

articles.title: DPRK Government Gives Reception for Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK Government Gives Reception for Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The government of the DPRK gave a reception at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel Thursday in honor of the delegations and delegates of the organizations for the study of the Juche idea on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Present there on invitation were delegations and delegates of the organizations for the study of the Juche idea including Harish Gupta, vice-director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education, who is also chairman of the Korean Social Scientists Association, and officials concerned.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Gangsters Keep Committing Reckless Military Provocations in Hotspot Waters of West Sea of Korea
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Gangsters Keep Committing Reckless Military Provocations in Hotspot Waters of West Sea of Korea
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military gangsters have gone all the more reckless in their military provocations in the waters of the DPRK side in the West Sea of Korea entering this month.
					 On Sept. 6 alone, a speedboat belonging to the 2nd Fleet of the puppet Navy intruded into the waters of our side more than 4km from the extension of the military demarcation line southwest of Yonphyong Island at around 11:18 and other speedboats committed five similar military provocations in its wake.
					
					 When the Korean People's Army (KPA) served repeated warnings to the intruding enemy speedboats to leave at once, the south Korean puppet gangsters spouted a spate of sophism that the DPRK's fishing boats should stop their fishing operations in its waters in a bid to justify their intrusion. Then they hastily took to flight afraid of the retaliatory action from the KPA navy.
					
					 These provocations of the gangsters of the puppet army in the waters can never be overlooked.  
					
					 Their ceaseless infiltration of speedboats into the waters of the DPRK side right after the close of the largest-ever Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill for aggression reveals their sinister scenario to steadily push the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 This is evidenced by the rapid increase in their intrusions into the waters of the DPRK side near Paekryong Island and Yonphyong Island in the West Sea of Korea from the outset of the month. 
					
					 They infiltrated such boats three times into the waters of the DPRK side north of Paekryong Island and waters of the DPRK side southwest of Yonphyong Island on Sept. 2 and 3. Similar intrusions were deliberately made five times on Sept. 4 and 5.
					
					 The military tension in the waters is being escalated to the extreme phase in the waters due to the puppet military gangsters who are working hard to prompt the KPA to take a self-defensive action through escalation of military intrusions in the biggest hotspot waters in the West Sea of Korea and exploit the occasion for branding the KPA as "provocateur" and justifying their war hysteria against the DPRK.
					
					 No one can predict when these provocations would spill over into military clashes. 
					
					 The KPA had already strongly warned the military gangsters not to resort to reckless military provocations. 
					
					 The puppet military gangsters of south Korea should not forget event a moment that they will have to pay a dear price for their extremely adventurous military provocations.

articles.title: Dancing Party of Officials, Members of Women's Union Held
articles.content:
Dancing Party of Officials, Members of Women's Union Held
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- There took place a dancing party of officials and members of the women's union at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph on Thursday on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The dancing party began amid the playing of "Song of the Proclamation of the People's Republic".
					
					 They danced to the tune of such songs as "I Will Be like a Star Following Party" and "Fly Our Tri-color National Flag of the Republic" expressing boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who built the socialist state independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence by dint of Songun on this land and let the DPRK flag fly across the world.
					
					 They presented more cheerful dances to the tune of such songs as "Ongheya" reflecting the pride of the Korean women who enjoy a worthwhile life as flowers of the country and the era under the care of the peerlessly great persons who put forward them as the driving force pushing one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot.
					
					 The festive atmosphere reached its height when the song "Joy of the People" resounded far and wide, reflecting the boundless glory and pride of having supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the top posts of the party and the DPRK as he is the great father whom all the people entrust their destiny and future and follow.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Kim Il Sung University of Politics
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Kim Il Sung University of Politics
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited Kim Il Sung University of Politics on the 68th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The members of the corps laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the university and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Being briefed on the immortal feats of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu who made great contributions to the development of the Korean revolutionary armed forces, they looked round the revolutionary museum, gymnasium, e-library, etc.
					
					 They also toured Pyongyang Orphans' Secondary School.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Members of the missions of the WFP, FAO and United Nations Population Fund here and Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Thursday on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Earlier, members of the missions of the UNDP and WHO here placed floral baskets before the statues of the great leaders.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here Thursday visited the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the mosaics depicting President Kim Il Sung among silk reelers and leader Kim Jong Il giving field guidance to the mill and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round the room for the education in the revolutionary history, the room dedicated to the history of the mill and other places of the mill.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
 Chongjin, September 8 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen held a meeting at Chongjin Port Thursday on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					   The participants laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Chongjin City and paid tribute to them.
					
					   Present there were the captain and crewmen of Jamaica-flagged ship New Global.
					
					   The speakers said that   the President's founding of the DPRK was a historic event which proclaimed to the world the birth of a sovereign state guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will be immortal in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the progressives thanks to the immortal feats they performed for the founding and development of the DPRK, they noted.
					
					 They expressed belief that the army and people of the DPRK advancing with confidence under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un would resolutely smash the U.S. imperialists' and hostile forces' vicious moves to stifle and isolate the DPRK and achieve a final victory in the struggle to build a powerful socialist country and reunify the country.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They were handed to Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK who is doyen of the diplomatic corps, on Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The floral basket was handed to Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Basket Kim Jong Un from Family of Chinese Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Martyr
articles.content:
Floral Basket Kim Jong Un from Family of Chinese Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Martyr
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Thursday received a floral basket from the family of Zhang Weihua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on of the 68th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.

articles.title: Cuban Embassy Officials Visit Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill
articles.content:
Cuban Embassy Officials Visit Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy visited the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill on the month of solidarity with the Cuban people.
					 The guests went round the rayon fabrics shop, combined weaving shop and other places of the mill.
					
					 They also visited the Phyongchon Revolutionary Site and enjoyed a performance given by art groups at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace.

articles.title: Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Here
articles.content:
Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Here
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Mayambala Lawrence, chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, arrived here Thursday on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.

articles.title: Hungju Youth Power Station No. 3 Goes Operational
articles.content:
Hungju Youth Power Station No. 3 Goes Operational
 Kanggye, September 8 (KCNA) -- Hungju Youth Power Station No. 3 went operational.
					 The construction of the power station makes it possible to carry out the behests of the great leaders, more smoothly meet the need for electricity in Kanggye City and thus positively contribute to developing economy of Jagang Province and improving the people's living standard.
					
					 An inaugural ceremony of the power station took place on Thursday.

articles.title: Schoolchildren's Palace in Kanggye Remodeled
articles.content:
Schoolchildren's Palace in Kanggye Remodeled
 Kanggye, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Paeumui Cholligil Schoolchildren's Palace was successfully remodeled in Kanggye City of Jagang Province. Paeumui Cholligil means the 250-mile journey for learning made by President Kim Il Sung.
					 President Kim Il Sung stressed the need to build a schoolchildren's palace during his field guidance to Jagang Province in May, Juche 53 (1964). After the completion of the palace he named it "Paeumui Cholligil Schoolchildren's Palace" and sent a lot of educational facilities, musical instruments and vehicles to the palace.
					
					 Though leader Kim Jong Il was very busy with Songun revolutionary leadership, he watched performances given by art group members of the palace and sent educational facilities dozens of times.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un was so kind as to make sure that the palace was remodeled at the highest level, noting that there is nothing to spare for the younger generation.
					
					 The palace has over 30 rooms for hobby groups such as math, IT, automobiles, fine art, dancing, kayagum and piano and a multi-purpose gymnasium and all conditions and environment for extracurricular education of school youth and children.
					
					 There took place an inaugural ceremony on the spot on Thursday.

articles.title: Advanced Methods Speeds up Railway Project in DPRK
articles.content:
Advanced Methods Speeds up Railway Project in DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- New methods of civil engineering have been introduced to the construction of Hyesan-Samjiyon railway in the DPRK, accelerating the project at a fast tempo.
					 They include an execution technical for special abamurus by cavity and buttress that was presented to the 31st National Festival of Science and Technology. This method helps save huge manpower and building materials.
					
					 There are also a lot of advanced building methods such as a non-framework construction method and new methods for reinforcing beds and building underground structure.

articles.title: Modernization Drive Brisk in DPRK's Light Industrial Sector
articles.content:
Modernization Drive Brisk in DPRK's Light Industrial Sector
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A drive for modernizing the production processes with home-made equipment has been getting brisk at light industrial establishments of the DPRK.
					 The Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory put all its production processes on an automated, streamlined, germ-free and dust-free basis. And it improved even the analysis apparatuses with home-made ones.
					
					 The Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory raised the localization rate of its facilities up to 90 percent and developed tens of kinds of new products.
					
					 The Ryuwon Shoes Factory launched a project to update itself in a big way, while the Sinuiju Cosmetics Factory strove to put soap and cosmetics production processes on an unmanned basis.
					
					 Similar successes were also made at the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill, the Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory and the Kanggye Pencil Factory.

articles.title: World People Praise Kim Il Sung, Founder of DPRK
articles.content:
World People Praise Kim Il Sung, Founder of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung founded the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on September 9, Juche 37 (1948), putting forward the popular masses as master of the power and the country.
					 After the birth of the DPRK, its people have creditably defended the socialist system centered on the popular masses.
					
					 Despite the imperialists' persistent moves to isolate the DPRK in political, military and economic aspects, the DPRK has made long strides.
					
					 Witnessing this reality, the progressives of the world highly praise Kim Il Sung as the founder of socialist Korea and highly appreciate his feats for nation building.
					
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania said:
					
					 The Korean people hold in high esteem His Excellency Kim Il Sung as the eternal President of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Il Sung, who embarked on the road of revolution in his early years, liberated the country from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule to provide its people with a genuine life and happiness. He built a socialist power where the popular masses play a role of masters of the country for the first time in the history of the Korean nation.
					
					 An official of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK said:
					
					 Under the wise guidance of Kim Il Sung, the DPRK had won victories one after another. The credit for the victorious advance made by it goes to Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea.
					
					 The Egyptian newspaper Al-Misaiya in an article titled "Korea and Its Founder Kim Il Sung" noted that President Kim Il Sung is the father of the Korean nation as he built a people's country for the first time in the nation's history of 5000 years, a socialist power not wavered under any storm and stress.
					
					 Media of Nepal, Mexico and many other countries stressed that the feats performed by the President in building up the DPRK into an invincible socialist power, will remain forever.

articles.title: Great Men's Feats Associated with History of Building Juche-based Power
articles.content:
Great Men's Feats Associated with History of Building Juche-based Power
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- With the founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (September 9, 1948) as an occasion, the Korean people recollect the undying feats performed by their great leaders in the history of building the Juche-based power.
					 President Kim Il Sung set forth the line of building a people's power and gained precious experience for building the power during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 In his historic speech at an assembly for setting up the people's revolutionary government in the Fifth District, Wangqing in March 1933, he clarified that the people's revolutionary government is a genuine power for the popular masses which defends their rights and freedom and struggles for the country's independence and its people's happiness.
					
					 Under the people's government set up in guerrilla zones, the Korean people could do farming without any worries and their children could study free of charge.
					
					 After Korea's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, he founded the people's government and regular armed forces inheriting the anti-Japanese revolutionary traditions and enforced overall democratic reforms to lay a solid foundation for building an independent and sovereign state. On this basis, he founded the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 Afterwards, he had led the work to strengthen the power organs and consolidate the state and social system.
					
					 Thanks to his tireless efforts, many popular policies could be enforced in the country by the Party and government. They include universal free education system, universal free medical care system, social insurance and social security system, system of rest at sanatoria and a system of offering houses at the state expense.
					
					 With the President's idea on Juche-based nation-building and his undying feats, leader Kim Jong Il had strengthened the DPRK into a dignified sovereign state and a powerful socialist country guided by ardent patriotism.
					
					 In his historic work "Let Us Bring the Advantages of Our People's Government into Fuller Play" published in December 1992, he referred in detail to the stability and vitality of the people's government and to the matters for improving the role of the power organs.
					
					 In September 2008, he made public a celebrated work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Juche-Oriented Socialist State with Invincible Might". In the work he clarified the popular and independent characters of the DPRK and its invincible might, indicating the tasks and ways for stepping up the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Pursuing the Songun (military-first) policy for decades, he led the people's power to fully discharge its mission and duty as a representative of the people's rights for independence, organizer of their creative ability and activities, householder responsible for the people's living and protector of their interests.
					
					 Even when the country was pressed hard for everything, he made sure that the popular policies of the Party and the state were invariably maintained and socialist fairylands were built in various parts of the country.
					
					 The DPRK is now giving full play to its might as the Juche-based socialist state, most dignified in the world, under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slashes at Japan, S. Korean Regime's Moves to Gloss over Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slashes at Japan, S. Korean Regime's Moves to Gloss over Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries reportedly remitted a petty amount of money to the south Korean puppet authorities in a sinister bid to clinch at an early date the issue of sexual slavery they "agreed" to solve with those authorities last year.
					 The Japanese authorities again raised the issue of removing a girl statue before the Japanese Embassy in Seoul as a precondition.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Thursday terms this an impudent behavior of the Japanese reactionaries to work hard to write off their history of brutal aggression and crimes against humanity at any cost.
					
					 What matters is the nasty behavior of the puppet ruling quarters to prolong their dirty remaining days by clinging to the coattails of outsiders in utter disregard of the dignity and interests of the nation, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime faked up a "foundation for reconciliation and recovery", pursuant to the "agreement" with the Japanese authorities despite strong protest of the south Korean people of different circles against the humiliating negotiations. Not content with this, it recently held a bargaining with the Japanese reactionaries in Seoul under the pretext of "discussing a follow-up measure."
					
					 This is an act of treachery that can be perpetrated only by the Park Geun Hye group, wicked pro-Japanese stooges, kowtowing to foreign forces and rubbing salt into the wounds of the victims of the sexual slavery.
					
					 Not only all Koreans but also the international community are shocked and angered at the Japanese reactionaries who are bitterly insulting the personality and dignity of the victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army with such nonsensical talk that "there was no forcible drafting of comfort women" and shamelessly moving to burry the crime-woven past into oblivion and at the Park Geun Hye group of traitors cooperating with them without any principle.
					
					 Japan is obliged to make reparation without fail for the human, material, cultural, mental and moral losses it inflicted upon the Korean people in the past on the basis of its admission to state and legal responsibility.

articles.title: Newspapers Demand Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea
articles.content:
Newspapers Demand Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK's leading newspapers Thursday dedicate articles to 71 years since the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' occupation of south Korea. They say the U.S. forces' occupation of south Korea was an unpardonable criminal act of mercilessly trampling down the Korean nation's aspiration and right to its independent development. 
					 The history of the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea is the one of disaster that brought all sorts of misfortune and pain to the people and the one of crimes as it has blocked the reunification of the Korean nation and seriously threatened peace on the Korean peninsula, Rodong Sinmun says, adding:
					
					 Looking back upon the crime-woven history of the U.S. imperialist aggressors who occupied south Korea in the guise of "liberator", the Korean nation keenly realizes once again that the U.S. is the sworn enemy.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the Park Geun Hye group of traitors, kowtowing to its master U.S., has cried out for "stronger alliance" whenever an opportunity presented itself. It took a stupid action of indefinitely extending the OPECON, imploring for the permanent presence of the U.S. forces in south Korea.
					
					 Disgusting is that the Park group is working hard to introduce THAAD into south Korea, terming the compatriots' nuclear deterrent for defending the Korean nation and preserving peace and stability on the Korean peninsula a "threat."
					
					 The Park group which is in the grip of extreme ruling crisis, rejected and censured by the public, is clinging more tightly to the coattails of its American master. 
					
					 It is the most urgent task of the era to put an end of the puppet conservative group's pro-U.S. sycophantic and treacherous acts and drive the U.S. imperialist aggressors out of south Korea.
					
					 Minju Joson says that all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad will wage a more dynamic nation-wide struggle to terminate the U.S. imperialists' presence in south Korea and thus drive outside forces out of south Korea and certainly achieve the independent reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Judicial Officials Tainted with Scandals
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Judicial Officials Tainted with Scandals
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Scandals of high-ranking bureaucrats under the puppet Ministry of Justice of south Korea were disclosed one after another recently.
					 On September 2 the Seoul Central District Court issued a warrant for the arrest of the superintendent judge of the Inchon District Court on charges that he received a bribe and at least 170 million won from the representative of an enterprise in the course of handling a case.
					
					 The superintendent judge under the administrative department of the court was booked without detention at the Seoul Suso Police Station on August 2 on the suspicion of sexual trade.

articles.title: Release of Prisoners of Conscience, Abolition of Fascist Law Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Release of Prisoners of Conscience, Abolition of Fascist Law Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Group for Joint Action for Meeting Prisoners of Conscience in south Korea held a press conference outside the Pusan Prison demanding the release of prisoners of conscience and the abolition of the fascist law, according to the south Korean paper Nodong and Segye.
					 Speakers accused the authorities for criminalizing workers protesting against suppression, far from punishing entrepreneurs for cracking down on the workers working under poor conditions.
					
					 A press release was read out at the press conference.
					
					 It demanded the authorities set free all the prisoners of conscience at once and abolish the "Security Law".

articles.title: Korean Body in China Denounces U.S., S. Korean Regime for Their Moves for THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
Korean Body in China Denounces U.S., S. Korean Regime for Their Moves for THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China made public a statement on Sept. 5 condemning the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime's moves for THAAD deployment.
					 The U.S. THAAD deployment in south Korea is not aimed to counter the "north's nuclear threat" but to seek a military edge in its scenario for domination and hegemony of Asia, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Nevertheless, Park Geun Hye and riffraffs of the "Saenuri Party" are escalating military confrontation with the north and working hard to deploy THAAD, regarding it as the "most effective one for coping with threat from the north."
					
					 The statement branded the action of the puppet regime as an unpardonable provocation to the DPRK and an outrageous action of bringing a nuclear disaster to the nation, pursuant to the U.S. nuclear war scenario and offering south Korea as its global nuclear outpost.
					
					 The statement declared that the General Association of Koreans in China and all Koreans in China would never pardon but fight against the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces in their moves against peace, nation and reunification to deploy THAAD despite repeated warnings of the DPRK and criticism by the public at home and abroad while finding fault with the DPRK's nuclear deterrence.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo, Art Exhibition Opens in Russia
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo, Art Exhibition Opens in Russia
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and art exhibition opened in Naberezhnie Chelni City of the Republic of Tatarstan of the Russian Federation on September 2 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 On display on the front of the venue of the exhibition was a photo of leader Kim Jong Il meeting President Putin.
					
					 Also on display there were photos dealing with revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were their works, photos showing grand monumental edifices built under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, books introducing Songun Korea and art pieces associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the photo of Kim Jong Il meeting Putin and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The chairman of the city committee of the Artists Union of Russia in an opening speech wished the Korean people led by Kim Jong Un greater success in the building of a socialist power and hoped for further development in the cultural exchange between the two countries, warmly congratulating the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Marked in Sweden
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Marked in Sweden
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A meeting, book and photo exhibition and film show took place in Stockholm of Sweden on September 4 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Exhibited at the venues of the events were books and photos introducing proud successes made by the army and people of the DPRK in the drive for the final victory in building a socialist power under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Korean film "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity" was shown.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets and flowers before the portraits of the smiling great leaders and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, said that the Korean people overcame ordeals and difficulties under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and proclaimed the founding of their country, the DPRK.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The DPRK has smashed all provocative moves of the hostile forces for a long period and constantly advanced along the road of socialism under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK, vigorously struggling for peace on the Korean peninsula and reunification of the country under the banner of Songun, is greatly encouraging progressive mankind aspiring after independence.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Marked in India
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Marked in India
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A seminar, book exhibition and film show took place at the Indian Society for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on September 2 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 On display at the venues of the events were books dealing with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Korean film "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity" was shown.
					
					 S. P. Pathak, chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said:
					
					 September 9 is the 68th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is a socialist state centred on the popular masses.
					
					 The Korean people put absolute trust in the people's government and take it dear to their heart as they have become fully aware of the truth through their life experience that the DPRK is the genuine country for the people.
					
					 As there was such absolute support and trust of the people, socialist Korea did not flinch back even an inch when socialism suffered a setback in different countries late in the last century.
					
					 The DPRK has turned into a prosperous country for the people thanks to the leadership of the respected HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean people will surely build a socialist power.

articles.title: Seminars Held in Mexico, Uganda
articles.content:
Seminars Held in Mexico, Uganda
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- There took place seminars in Mexico and Uganda on Sept. 2 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They were attended by personages of the Mexican Friend Association for Memory of President Kim Il Sung and Leader Kim Jong Il and the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement and masses.
					
					 Andres Gasca Sanchez, president of the Mexican Friend Association for Memory of President Kim Il Sung and Leader Kim Jong Il, said that the President is a peerless patriot and the eternal leader of the Korean people who liberated Korea from the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists and founded the DPRK, the first people's democratic state in the East.
					
					 The President built the DPRK into a strong socialist country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence and a genuine people's country in which socialist policies including the systems of free medical care and free education are thoroughly enforced, and performed immortal feats in accomplishing the cause of world socialism, the cause of human independence under the unfurled banner for independence against imperialism, he said.
					
					 Daniel Rugarama, chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement, said that the DPRK has turned into an invincible and politic-ideological power and military power under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Nigerian Figure Blasts U.S. and Its Allies' Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
Nigerian Figure Blasts U.S. and Its Allies' Moves against DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism issued a statement on Sept. 2 in denunciation of the U.S. and its allies' moves against the DPRK.
					 He recalled that DPRK's national defence scientists and technicians succeeded in the test-fire of submarine-launched ballistic missile on a higher stage.
					
					 He said that it is like a thief crying "Stop the thief!" for the U.S. and its allies to release a press release taking issue with the DPRK over its test-fire at the UN Security Council.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Despite the public criticism at home and abroad, the U.S. is running amuck to mount another preemptive attack on the DPRK after introducing nuclear strategic assets and huge armed forces into south Korea.
					
					 It is the U.S. which poses the danger of a nuclear war to the Korean peninsula.
					
					 We bitterly condemn the U.S. for its illegal acts of finding fault with the DPRK's measure for bolstering up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence by abusing the UN Security Council.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to withdraw all aggression forces including nuclear weapons from south Korea and stop blocking Korea's reunification, properly facing up to the trend of the times.

articles.title: Acto central por el 68o aniversario de fundacion de RPDC
articles.content:
Acto central por el 68o aniversario de fundacion de RPDC 
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este jueves en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 68o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung creo las valiosas experiencias de la construccion del Poder popular en el fragor de la revolucion antijaponesa y preparo la firme base de la construccion de un Estado independiente y soberano despues de la liberacion de la patria. A base de ello, el 9 de septiembre del 37 (1948) de la Era Juche, proclamo a todo el mundo la fundacion de la RPDC. 
					
					Asistieron al acto central Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los miembros del organo de direccion del Comite Central del Partido en la ciudad de Pyongyang, los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema, los funcionarios de los organismos del Partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales y los cuadros de los organismos, fabricas y empresas de la capital, los ameritados laborales, los familiares de martires revolucionarios, los miembros del grupo de felicitacion de coreanos residentes en Japon, los compatriotas en ultramar, y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang. 
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los agregados militares, acreditados en Corea. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC.
					
					El informante dijo que la fundacion de la RPDC fue el nacimiento de Poder popular de nuevo tipo sin precedentes en la historia y un acontecimiento nacional que trajo el cambio radical en la forja del destino del pueblo coreano y la construccion de patria prospera. 
					
					A lo largo de cerca de 70 anos, la RPDC resolvio mas satisfactoriamente muchas tareas historicas que se presentaban en la construccion de potencia de la era de la independencia superando la severa tempestad de la revolucion bajo la orientacion del gran lider y gran partido y ha recorrido una trayectoria llena de victorias e innovaciones. 
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il forjaron el potencial ideo-politico, economico y militar que garantiza la prosperidad eterna de la RPDC. 
					
					Tomando la unidad monolitica por el fundamento del socialismo coreano y el remedio omnipotente de la construccion de una potencia, fortalecieron por todos los medios las fuerzas subjetivas de la revolucion y consolidaron la base ideo-politica de la RPDC.
					
					Durante todo el proceso de direccion sobre la revolucion, presentaron los asuntos militares como primordiales problemas estatales y concentraron todas las fuerzas en el fortalecimiento de la capacidad de defensa nacional, de manera que fortalecieron el Ejercito Popular de Corea como invicto ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu y convirtieron la patria en la potencia militar de talla mundial. 
					
					Al considerar la reunificacion de la patria como suprema causa patriotica, hicieron todo lo posible hasta el ultimo periodo de sus vidas revolucionarias para entregar la paria reunificada a las generaciones venideras e hicieron aporte inmortal al cumplimiento de la causa de verificacion de la independencia en el mundo entero desarrollando energicas actividades exteriores.
					
					Hoy en dia, la RPDC esta acogiendo la era dorada de la construccion de la potencia socialista gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Se debe mantener invariablemente los autoctonos lineamientos sobre la reunificacion, presentados por los grandes Lideres, y ejecutar estrictamente las Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Paria para cumplir sin falta la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria con las fuerzas unidas de todos los connacionales. 
					
					En el futuro tambien, el gobierno de la RPDC ampliara y desarrollara las relaciones de buena vecindad, amistad y cooperacion con varios paises del mundo que respetan su soberania nacional y le tratan con amabilidad, manteniendo con firmeza el ideal de la politica exterior de la independencia, la paz y la amistad, y hara ingentes esfuerzos por defender la paz y la seguridad de la region y verificar la independencia en el mundo entero. 
					
					No podran detener con nada el avance del ejercito y pueblo de Corea que marchan firmemente hacia la cumbre de la potencia socialista bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX critica reciente disparate de Obama contra la RPDC
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX critica reciente disparate de Obama contra la RPDC
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En una conferencia conjunta de prensa, Obama, que visita ahora a Laos para tomar parte en la Cumbre de Asia Oriental, dijo que es "provocativo" el lanzamiento consecutivo de cohetes balisticos de la RPDC y que su plan nuclear y de misil balistico constituye una "amenaza" para EE.UU. y los Estados acompanantes de la region. Prosiguio que la "provocacion" causara la mayor presion y se esforzara por hacer mas efectiva la sancion anti-RPDC. 
					El nuevo disparate de Obama no pasa de ser el esfuerzo agonico para eludir las criticas a su politica sobre la RPDC, que se aumentan dentro y fuera del territorio estadounidense, y fomentar el ambiente de presion internacional contra nuestro pais. 
					
					Insiste asi el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en una declaracion publicada el dia 8 y continua:
					
					La RPDC es la zona mas candente del mundo que se encuentra siempre en la crisis de guerra nuclear debido a EE.UU. que introduce muchas propiedades estrategicas en las cercanias de la primera y libra los ejercicios militares conjuntos para asestarle el ataque preventivo nuclear. El unico remedio para prevenir la guerra y defender la paz en nuestro pais es elevar por todos los medios la capacidad de autodefensa nacional con disuasivo nuclear como su eje. 
					
					EE.UU. habla del dialogo y negociaciones recurriendo persistentemente junto con las fuerzas hostiles a la inaudita sancion economica y la intrigante campana de "DDHH" contra la RPDC, lo cual es una burla e insulto intolerables para esta. 
					
					Para EE.UU., el mejor remedio para evitar el golpe demoledor de la RPDC es controlarse dejando de atentar contra la dignidad y la soberania de la segunda. 
					
					Frente a la brutal politica hostil de EE.UU. que se atreve a amenazar la soberania nacional y el derecho a la existencia de nuestro pais, tomaremos multiples medidas trascendentales para redoblar la capacidad de ataque nuclear.

articles.title: Direcciones nortena, surena y ultramarina de APRP publican resolucion conjunta
articles.content:
Direcciones nortena, surena y ultramarina de APRP publican resolucion conjunta 
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Las direcciones nortena, surena y ultramarina de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria hicieron publica el dia 8 una resolucion conjunta. 
					La nota recuerda que transcurrieron 71 anos desde cuando las tropas agresoras norteamericanas disfrazadas de "libertador" entraron en el suelo surcoreano, y prosigue:
					
					La ocupacion del Sur de Corea por ellas deviene un acto agresivo ilegal cometido con el siniestro objetivo de ocupar toda la Peninsula Coreana y convertirla en la cabeza de puente para realizar la ambicion de dominar a Asia y el resto del mundo.
					
					Es deplorable que Corea, que no es pais criminal ni el derrotado en guerra, sufriera siglo tras siglo la tragedia de division nacional bajo las botas de agresores yanquis. 
					
					Mientras persista la ocupacion militar del Sur de Corea, no habra la paz en la tierra patria ni se cumplira el deseo nacional sobre la reunificacion, ni se podra prevenir la crisis de guerra nuclear. 
					
					Partiendo de la voluntad de abrir en la delantera la nueva era de reunificacion independiente del pais y prosperidad nacional al expulsar de este territorio a las tropas ocupantes, las direcciones nortena, surena y ultramarina de la APRP resuelven los siguientes puntos: 
					
					1. La APRP sera siempre vanguardia en la lucha por expulsar cuanto antes a las tropas yanquis del territorio patrio y realizar la soberania completa de la nacion y la paz duradera.
					
					2. La APRP frustrara rotundamente las imprudentes tentativas de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion internas y externas de provocar la guerra. 
					
					3. La APRP promovera con toda energia la gran unidad y cohesion de toda la nacion. 
					
					Al finalizar, el documento exhorto a todos los connacionales dentro y fuera del pais a movilizarse como un solo hombre en la lucha pannacional antiyanqui por expulsar del territorio patrio a los uniformados norteamericanos y abrir la nueva epoca de reunificacion independiente, paz y prosperidad uniendose firmemente bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".

articles.title: Oficina Regional de Sudeste Asiatico de OMS otorga premio al MINSAP de la RPDC
articles.content:
Oficina Regional de Sudeste Asiatico de OMS otorga premio al MINSAP de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Quedo conferido al Ministerio de Salud Publica de la RPDC el premio sobresaliente de salud publica de la Oficina Regional del Sudeste Asiatico de la Organizacion Mundial de la Salud. 
					El premio fue entregado el dia 5 a Jang Jun Sang, viceministro de Salud Publica y jefe de la delegacion de salud publica de la RPDC a la 69a asamblea regional del sudeste asiatico de la OMS que tiene lugar en Sri Lanka. 
					
					Esto deviene una expresion de consentimiento y apoyo a la superioridad y vitalidad del sistema de salud publica socialista de Corea en que gracias a la politica del Presidente Kim Jong Un de apreciar, respetar y amar al pueblo y a su destacada orientacion se registran notables exitos en el fomento de salud publica, el tratamiento y la profilaxis por las construcciones de las modernas bases de servicio medico e instalaciones de cultura e higiene.

articles.title: Asociacion de Cruz Roja desarrolla actividades de socorro en Hamgyong del Norte
articles.content:
Asociacion de Cruz Roja desarrolla actividades de socorro en Hamgyong del Norte
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea desarrolla las actividades de socorro de emergencia en las zonas damnificadas por las inundaciones de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte. 
					Un funcionario correspondiente cito a la ACNC que en colaboracion con la sucursal de la ACR en la provincia mencionada y con los miembros de la delegacion de la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja que trabajan en Corea, los miembros de la ACR hacen esfuerzos por resarcir las consecuencias de los danos y estabilizar la vida de los moradores. 
					
					La ACR envio con rapidez a los habitantes de las zonas damnificadas los materiales de socorro de emergencia reservados para mas de 5 mil familias, entre otros, las tiendas, los enseres domesticos, las frazadas, las cubas y otros articulos de primera necesidad. 
					
					Los miembros de la ACR y los voluntarios realizan las actividades de servicio medico a los danados instalando en varios lugares los puestos de primeros auxilios y ayudan la distribucion de materiales de socorro.

articles.title: Tiene lugar el seminario internacional de la idea Juche
articles.content:
Tiene lugar el seminario internacional de la idea Juche
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 68o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, tuvo lugar el dia 8 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el seminario internacional de la idea Juche sobre la independencia antiimperialista y la solidaridad bajo auspicios del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche. 
					Asistieron el subdirector general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche, Harish Gupta, y las delegaciones y delegados de las organizaciones de estudio de la idea Juche de varios paises y regiones. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes Kim Ki Nam, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Thae Hyong Chol, rector general de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, ministro de Educacion Superior y presidente de la Asociacion Coreana de Cientificos Sociales, y otros funcionarios interesados. 
					
					El director del IIIJ, Takao Kamakura, pronuncio la palabra de apertura, seguida del discurso de felicitacion de Thae Hyong Chol. 
					
					Los oradores expresaron la conviccion de que el presente foro sera una reunion historica para intercambiar los exitos y experiencias adquiridos en el estudio y divulgacion de la idea Juche y estudiar los problemas teoricos y practicos que se presentan en la lucha por la independencia antiimperialista. 
					
					Al presentar el informe de la ocasion, Harish Gupta dijo que en la actualidad en que se aumenta cada dia mas la aspiracion de la humanidad a la independencia, la celebracion del seminario reviste suma importancia. 
					
					Insistio en que la organizaciones de estudio de la idea Juche deben dinamizar el estudio y la divulgacion del Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo, que viene estimulando mucho la causa de la independencia demostrando su inusual fuerza atractiva entre amplias masas populares, y ampliar constantemente las filas de adeptos a la idea Juche. 
					
					Triunfara sin falta la justa causa que avanza bajo la bandera del Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo, enfatizo y exhorto a luchar con energia por construir un nuevo mundo libre y pacifico donde no hay la agresion ni la guerra, unidos compactamente bajo la bandera de lucha antiimperialista. 
					
					Luego, hubo intervenciones. 
					
					Los seminaristas explicaron de manera profunda y concreta los problemas que se presentan en promover la verificacion de la independencia en el mundo entero solidarizandose bajo la bandera de la independencia antiimperialista que toma por guia directriz la inmortal idea Juche. 
					
					Destacaron la necesidad de activar mas el estudio sobre la idea Juche, realizar de modo diversificado y activo la labor de su divulgacion, agrupar a la organizacion todas las personas aspirantes a la independencia y la justicia, la veracidad y el progreso y amplificar las filas principales. 
					
					En el foro fue aprobada una carta dirigida al Presidente Kim Jong Un.
